headline: Ask HN: Why is the Ukraine government website not available
description:
Why is the website only available from within the Ukraine and why am I getting a 503 from within the Ukraine see picture below:

https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v

<a href="https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v"><img src="https://i.ibb.co/s9DLvNv/22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site.png" alt="22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site" border="0"></a>
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么乌克兰政府网站无法使用
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼烏克蘭政府網站無法使用
description_zh-Hans:
为什么该网站只能在乌克兰境内使用，为什么我在乌克兰境内得到的是503，见下图：

https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v

<a href="https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v"><img src="https://i.ibb.co/s9DLvNv/22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site.png" alt="22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site" border="0" ></a>
description_zh-Hant:
為什麼該網站只能在烏克蘭境內使用，為什麼我在烏克蘭境內得到的是503，見下圖：

https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v

<a href="https://ibb.co/GQ1gv8v"><img src="https://i.ibb.co/s9DLvNv/22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site.png" alt="22-03-02-at-13-45-35-WA-Image-not-available-site" border="0" ></a>
